us excuse me space crab lets you make

those actions get logged into an s3

the extended metadata attributes from
the data store and pushes them into an
alerting pipeline that alerting pipeline

send an email that goes into your

so in our sadly truncated research we
found that there are exactly two kinds
of people who use compromised AWS
accounts the first one will find some
credentials lying around in github and
put them in like a GUI s3 bucket
browsing program and they'll try and
list bucket since when they see that
they can't list any buckets they just
give up they lack discipline the second
kind will collect all of the credentials
that he finds and then puts it put them
in a Python script that they wrote and
try every API that AWS offers
so they're not necessarily interested in
